69 /*========== Macros and Definitions =========================================*/
70 
71 #if !defined(INCLUDE_vTaskDelayUntil)
72 #error \
73  "foxBMS requires using FreeRTOS 'vTaskDelayUntil' (wrapped in 'OS_taskDelayUntil'), therefore 'INCLUDE_vTaskDelayUntil' must be defined to '1'."
74 #endif /* INCLUDE_vTaskDelayUntil */
75 
76 #if !defined(INCLUDE_xTaskGetSchedulerState)
77 #error \
78  "foxBMS requires using FreeRTOS 'xTaskGetSchedulerState' therefore 'INCLUDE_xTaskGetSchedulerState' must be defined to '1'."
79 #endif /* INCLUDE_xTaskGetSchedulerState */
80 
81 FAS_STATIC_ASSERT(
82  (configMINIMAL_STACK_SIZE * GEN_BYTES_PER_WORD) < (StackType_t)FTSK_TASK_ENGINE_STACK_SIZE_IN_BYTES,
83  "Size of the 'Engine' task is too small.");
84 FAS_STATIC_ASSERT(
85  (configMINIMAL_STACK_SIZE * GEN_BYTES_PER_WORD) < (StackType_t)FTSK_TASK_CYCLIC_1MS_STACK_SIZE_IN_BYTES,
86  "Size of the '1ms cyclic' task is too small.");
87 FAS_STATIC_ASSERT(
88  (configMINIMAL_STACK_SIZE * GEN_BYTES_PER_WORD) < (StackType_t)FTSK_TASK_CYCLIC_10MS_STACK_SIZE_IN_BYTES,
89  "Size of the '10ms cyclic' task is too small.");
90 FAS_STATIC_ASSERT(
91  (configMINIMAL_STACK_SIZE * GEN_BYTES_PER_WORD) < (StackType_t)FTSK_TASK_CYCLIC_100MS_STACK_SIZE_IN_BYTES,
92  "Size of the '100ms cyclic' task is too small.");
93 FAS_STATIC_ASSERT(
94  (configMINIMAL_STACK_SIZE * GEN_BYTES_PER_WORD) < (StackType_t)FTSK_TASK_CYCLIC_ALGORITHM_100MS_STACK_SIZE_IN_BYTES,
95  "Size of the '100ms cyclic algorithm' task is too small.");
96 FAS_STATIC_ASSERT(
97  (sizeof(StackType_t) == sizeof(uint32_t)),
98  "Assumptions on the size of StackType_t have been broken.");
99
